languages.text: {n}Запрокинув голову, Ульфар издает жуткий вой, исполненный тоски и сухого обещания скорой и мучительной гибели. Звуки его изгоняют из сердца всякое сомнение в том, что кровопролитие неизбежно.{/n}

{n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Запрокинув голову, Ульфар издает жуткий вой, исполненный тоски и сухого обещания скорой и мучительной гибели. Звуки его изгоняют из сердца всякое сомнение в том, что кровопролитие неизбежно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and a cold promise of a swift and painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that violence is inevitable.{/n}

{n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar rejette la tête en arrière en poussant un hurlement terrifiant, résonnant de la promesse d'une mort rapide quoique douloureuse. Son cri ne laisse place à aucun doute : le carnage est inévitable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar rejette la tête en arrière en poussant un hurlement terrifiant, résonnant de la promesse d'une mort rapide quoique douloureuse. Son cri ne laisse place à aucun doute : la violence est inévitable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}乌尔法向后仰着头，发出了恐怖的嚎叫声，昭示着他的对手将会迎来迅速而痛苦的死亡。这样的嚎叫声不禁让人发自内心地相信，鲜血与屠杀恐怕避无可避。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法向后仰着头，发出了恐怖的嚎叫声，昭示着他的对手将会迎来迅速而痛苦的死亡。这样的嚎叫声不禁让人发自内心地相信，暴力是避无可避的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは天を仰ぎ、すぐにでも相手をなぶり殺してやりたいかのような、恐ろしい唸り声を上げた。それは聞く者に、確実に血が流れるであろうことを予感させる声だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは天を仰ぎ、すぐにでも相手をなぶり殺してやりたいかのような、恐ろしい唸り声を上げた。それは聞く者に、確実に血が流れるであろうことを予感させる声だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar wirft seinen Kopf zurück und stößt dann ein furchterregendes Geheul aus. Es klingt nach Sehnsucht und der kalten Versprechung, für einen schnellen aber trotzdem schmerzhaften Tod zu sorgen. Der Klang lässt keinen Zweifel zurück, dass jetzt nur noch Blutvergießen folgen kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar wirft seinen Kopf zurück und stößt dann ein furchterregendes Geheul aus. Es klingt nach Sehnsucht und der kalten Versprechung, für einen schnellen aber trotzdem schmerzhaften Tod zu sorgen. Der Klang lässt keinen Zweifel zurück, dass jetzt nur noch Gewalt folgen kann.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar echa la cabeza hacia atrás y lanza un escalofriante aullido de anhelo con el que promete una muerte rápida aunque dolorosa. El sonido no deja lugar a dudas: el derramamiento de sangre es inevitable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar echa la cabeza hacia atrás y lanza un escalofriante aullido de anhelo con el que promete una muerte rápida aunque dolorosa. El sonido no deja lugar a dudas: la violencia es inevitable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar başını geriye atıyor. Özlem dolu ve korkutucu bir şekilde kükrüyor. Kükreyişiyle hızlı ama acı verici bir son vaat ediyor. Onu duyanlar, artık kan dökülmesinin kaçınılmaz olduğuna içten içe ikna oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar throws back his head and lets out a terrifying howl filled with longing and the cold promise of a swift yet painful demise. The sound of it leaves no doubt in one's heart that bloodshed is now inevitable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar başını geriye atıyor. Özlem dolu ve korkutucu bir şekilde kükrüyor. Kükreyiişiyle hızlı ama acı verici bir son vaat ediyor. Kükreyişini duyanlar, artık kan dökülmesinin kaçınılmaz olduğuna içten içe ikna oluyor.{/n}
